description:
Uryu asks Orihime to heal his injuries after sensing that his assailant has now made contact with Ichigo. Meanwhile, Ichigo enters his training with Ginjo inside Yukio’s Fulbring power “Invaders Must Die.”
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigo contre Ginjô dans l`espace du jeu
Ichigo vs Ginjou, Game no Kuukan e
Ichigo vs. Ginjou! To the Game`s Space
護vs銀城, ゲームの空間へ
